<script>
  window.markerConfig = {
    project: '67e428cb535a72d46b60f63d', // Replace this with your project ID
    source: 'snippet'
  };
  // Wait for Marker.io to load, then bind the custom button
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var reportButton = document.getElementById("custom-report-button");

    reportButton.addEventListener("click", function() {
      if (window.Marker && window.Marker.capture) {
        window.Marker.capture(); // Opens Marker.io widget
      } else {
        console.error("Marker.io has not loaded yet.");
      }
    });
  });

  // Function to simulate a click on the hidden button
function triggerClick() {
  var hiddenButton = document.getElementById('custom-report-button');
  
  if (hiddenButton) {
    hiddenButton.style.display = 'block';  // Make the button visible
    hiddenButton.click();  // Simulate the click
  }
}

// Listen for the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl + Shift + H)
document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {
  if (event.ctrlKey && event.shiftKey && event.key === 'H') {
    triggerClick();
  }
});

</script>
